cabra
Class Sanitizer

java.lang.Object
  cabra.Sanitizer

public abstract class Sanitizer
extends java.lang.Object

Allows for sanitation of file names (certain characters are disallowed)

Author:
Neel

Determines if a certain String has any disallowed chars in it

string - the String to test
Returns:
true if it has a disallowed char, false if not

public static java.lang.String sanitize(java.lang.String string)
Finds any disallowed chars in the string and removes them.

Parameters:
string - the string to test
Returns:
the sanitized string

removeSpaces

public static java.lang.String removeSpaces(java.lang.String string)
Replaces any spaces in the string with underscores, i.e. "Forty two" becomes "Forty_two"

Parameters:
string - the string to remove the spaces from
Returns:
the new string

removeUnderscores

public static java.lang.String removeUnderscores(java.lang.String string)
Replaces underscores in the string with spaces, i.e. "Forty_two" becomes "Forty two"

Parameters:
string - the string to remove the underscores from
Returns:
the new string
